title: Melilot Brandybuck, Merry Dancer (3R110)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Ally • Home 1 • Hobbit
Strength:	2
Vitality:	2
Site:	1
Game Text:	Response: If a burden is about to be added by a Shadow card, exert Melilot Brandybuck to prevent that burden.
Lore:	“Master Everard Took and Miss Melilot Brandybuck got on a table and with bells in their hands began to dance the Springle-ring: a pretty dance, but rather vigorous.”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Game text is a clarification.
